name: Color Bump Sides
description:
Color Bump sides is an easy to learn fast paced game about reflexes, avoidance and accuracy. Watch out or you may get hopelessly addicted.
How to Play

Features

- Fun and addictive gameplay
- Easy to learn
- 50 challenging levels
- Endless play mode



> Tap your screen to switch from side to side
> Avoid all obstacles in your path


ENJOY !
